name: Push the Button (bieere)
description:
You are the newest employee at Company Inc, Welcome! You will be tasked with keeping your control panel as clean as possible, while also ensuring that all buttons requiring pressing will be pressed promptly! Neglecting to do so will end in CATASTROPHE.

We at Company Inc. invite any individual whether senile or infant, to become our newest employee!

Repository: https://github.com/abr-designs/GMTK_2020-2
